lenders.loan_because: I was married two years ago and I have no permanent  job because I didn't finish my studies yet. I take up Bachelor of Science in Nursing, in one of the top universities here in Cagayan de Oro, Philippines. My focused now is on my small ''Sari-Sari store" business which we've plan with my wife to expand it. We have lots of plans and goals in business. But sadly we are financially deprived now. That's why we're searching for an institution who can help us find ways to make our business flourish, and to meet those business goals and plans achievable. Right now were looking for additional capital for our business.
lenders.occupational_info: I and my wife is very serious with our business right now. We are very positive that we can make it flourish someday. My wife is an accountancy graduate in one of the top Universities here in the Philippines. With here knowledge and my dedication we know we can make our plans in goals in business achievable.

lenders.name: Kandi
lenders.loan_because: I am a very small, sustainable agriculture farmer.  I believe in the production of food in a sustainable manner and feel through enabling others to do the same I am paying forward - in a way - to future generations of farmers throughout the world.  And, mostly, because I just love people and want to share that love.
lenders.occupational_info: We are small farmers and work away from home as well.  Our passion is in the farming, however.  We feel fortunate beyond our dreams to have our land and try to manage it in a way that it will be productive for many many generations to come.  We hope others want to do the same and enjoy helping in small ways to assist in this joint food producing venture.

lenders.name: Alan & Erin
lenders.loan_because: I loan because someone is in need and I can help.  We (all of humanity) are together on this one planet experiencing the same human condition.  Joy/sadness, gain/loss, success/failure, inspiration/hoplessness, these are familiar experiences to all of us! The stories told through Kiva from people in need are not from strangers in distant lands, but instead from my brothers and sisters with whom are close enough to touch.  Micro-financing through Kiva is simply a modern day integral means of spreading enlightenment.
lenders.occupational_info: At my job I am part of a large team devoted to healing the sick.  I help to find what makes you sick so we may begin to find the correct treatment.
